intent.purpose: Develop a comprehensive Smart Home Automation System.
intent.problem_being_solved: Homeowners struggle to manage multiple smart devices from different manufacturers using separate apps.

requirements.text: Develop a mobile application and web dashboard for remote control and monitoring of home devices.
Integrate support for 50+ device types from major manufacturers.
Implement real-time device status monitoring and alerts.
Create custom automation rules and pre-configured scenes.
Provide remote access via mobile app and web dashboard.
Integrate voice control with Alexa and Google Assistant.
Track energy consumption and provide analytics.

constraints.impact: Limits the scope and resources available for development.

constraints.text: Timeline of 9 months from kickoff to launch.
constraints.impact: Requires efficient project management and resource allocation.

constraints.text: Team composition: 2 backend developers, 2 mobile developers, 1 IoT engineer, 1 UI/UX designer.
constraints.impact: Defines the available human resources for the project.
Ensures legal compliance and data protection.

constraints.text: Must work on standard home networks without special hardware.
constraints.impact: Ensures ease of use and accessibility for users.

assumptions.assumption: The budget and timeline are sufficient to meet all outlined requirements.
assumptions.risk_if_wrong: Project may exceed budget or timeline, impacting delivery and quality.
